channel.title: Basic stuff
channel.description:
hey i have a couple things to ask. one is if i should learn any type of computer programing language to mess with moparscape what should it be. and two is when i got the server base it had no errors then when i changed the name of the person the npc says if they are online or not to my name why it said 100 errors? question 3 is why if i change something in the code like the current owner of the server why it wont change in the game. and last when i follow tuts perfectly like the clan one were you can make your own clans it wont work even when i followed it exaxtly.
i would like your help asap because i need to ge the servers fixed. thx

item.title: Basic stuff
item.dc:creator: @I_Hate_U I Hate U
item.description:
@I_Hate_U wrote:

JAVA. And you can’t ask allt hese questions. These things are what yi have to learn. When you change the owner name it’s obvious you didn’t change all of it.

Read full topic
